src:
Vina Panduwinata Kolaborasi dengan Milenial di 90's Festival
07 Nov 2019, 07:13 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Vina Panduwinata akan berkolaborasi dengan grup musik bentukannya berisikan milenial bernama Close Friend di The 90's Festival. (CNN Indonesia/M Andika Putra)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Penyanyi Vina PanduwinataÂ menjadi salah satu penampil di festival musik The 90's Festival. Ia mengatakan akan berkolaborasi dengan grup musik bentukannya yang berisikan milenial bernama Close Friend."Jadi membawakan lagu saya yang lama tapi dengan aransemen yang berbeda. Dibawakan dengan konsep tang berbeda, supaya bisa merangkul anak muda," kata Vina saat jumpa media di kawasan Jakarta Pusat, Rabu (6/11).Musisi yang akrab disapa Mama Ina ini menjelaskan ide kolaborasi dengan musisi milenial muncul pada 2017. Sejak itu ia membentuk Close Friend dan tampil bersama mereka.Mama Ina mengingat saat awal-awal tampil bersama Close Friend, kala itu ia bernyanyi sendiri di awal sehingga banyak penonton yang nyanyi bersama. Ketika Close Friend tampil, banyak penonton yang berdiri dan berjingkrak."Itu pada loncat-loncat, padahal umur udah 50-an. Kalau di musik enggak ada batasan umur, anak kecil atau udah tua boleh joget," kata Mama Ina.Salah satu musisi yang tergabung dalam Close Friend adalah Ikmal Tobing. Untuk tampil di The 90's Festival, mereka akan tampil membawakan lagu dengan aransemen musik elektronik pop yang ia sebut sebagai musik kekinian dan milenial."Kami rombak lagu Mama Ina, benar-benar ini (kami pikir) dosa apa enggak ya? Kami berat rombak lagu Mama Ina karena udah pakem banget aransemennya. Tapi tantangan buat gue untuk ubah aransemen jadi musik yang lebih kekinian," kata Ikmal.Untuk kali pertama, The 90's Festival akan diselenggarakan selama dua hari pada 23-24 November yang digelar di Gambir Expo Kemayoran, Jakarta Pusat. Ada empat musisi internasional yang tampil, mereka adalah Hanson, Aqua, Vertical Horizon dan Michael Learn to Rock. Sementara itu barisan musisi lokal dihuni Project, God Bless, Naif, Jamrud, Potret, P-Project, Powerslaves, M.E, Voices, Warna, Puspose, Wayang, Sheila on 7, Gigi, Vina Panduwinata, Tipe-x, Fariz RM, Arwana, Iwa K, Bunglon, Sweet Martabak, D.O.T, 7 Kurcaci, Jingga, Cherry Bombshell, Tofu, Element, Wong, Dr. PM dan U'camp. (adp/end)
text:
Vina Panduwinata Collaboration with Millennial in the 90's Festival
Nov 7 2019, 07:13 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Vina Panduwinata will collaborate with a band formed by millennial called Close Friend at The 90's Festival. (CNN Indonesia / M Andika Putra)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Singer Vina Panduwinata was one of the performers at The 90's Festival. He said he would collaborate with a music group he formed which consisted of millennial called Close Friend. "So, I brought my old song but with a different arrangement. It was delivered with a different tang concept, so that I could embrace young people," Vina said during a media conference in Central Jakarta. , Wednesday (6/11). The musician, who is familiarly called Mama Ina, explained the idea of collaboration with millennial musicians appeared in 2017. Since then he formed a Close Friend and performed with them. Ina Mama recalled the first time performing with Close Friend, at that time he sang alone at the beginning so that many audience members sang together. When Close Friend appeared, there were many spectators who stood up and pranced "It's jumping up and down, even though they are in their 50s. If there is no age limit in music, children or old people may dance," said Mama Ina. One of the musicians incorporated in Close Friend is Ikmal Tobing. To perform at The 90's Festival, they will perform a song with an electronic pop music arrangement which he calls "contemporary and millennial music." We overhaul Mama Ina's song, is this really (we thought) what sin or not? "Mama Ina is really good at arranging the arrangement. But the challenge for me is to change the arrangement to more contemporary music," Ikmal said. For the first time, The 90's Festival will be held for two days on November 23-24 which will be held at Gambir Expo Kemayoran, Jakarta. Center. There are four international musicians performing, they are Hanson, Aqua, Vertical Horizon and Michael Learn to Rock. Meanwhile, local musicians are occupied by Projects, God Bless, Naive, Jamrud, Portraits, P-Projects, Powerslaves, ME, Voices, Colors, Puspose, Puppets, Sheila on 7, Gigi, Vina Panduwinata, Type-x, Fariz RM, Arwana , Iwa K, Chameleon, Sweet Martabak, DOT, 7 Dwarves, Orange, Cherry Bombshell, Tofu, Element, Wong, Dr. PM and U'camp. (adp / end)
